name: React Github Finder
text: A GitHub user finder that allows you to look up the first 30 users matching your input into the search bar. You can preview the users profile by selecting the "More" button which will navigate you to the users profile preview where common stats are displayed.

name: Personal Portfolio
text: My personal portfolio created using React.js with reusable components and modular design. The components you see here can be used again and again in various projects and keeps the code from becoming cumbersome and is hosted on netlify

name: Node Express Mail API
text: Node application that takes post request to send a custom tailored email from the credentials that you provide in the query string with the values you input through an object as the body to a specified email or emails. This application was created using Node.js, Express.js and the nodemailer module.
